00119 #ifdef __LINUX__
00120 #define STP_FATAL(TXT, MSG, EXCOD)                      \
00121       {stp_trace ("FATAL:%s failed: %s:%d", TXT, MSG, EXCOD);  \
00122       exit (EXCOD);}
00123 #else
00124 #define STP_FATAL(TXT, MSG, EXCOD)                      \
00125       Print ("FATAL: %s code %s:%d\n", TXT, MSG, EXCOD)
00126 #endif
00127 
00128 #define STP_MALLOC(PTR, TYPE, MSG)              \
00129   {                                             \
00130     PTR = (TYPE*) calloc (1, sizeof (TYPE));    \
00131     if (! PTR) {                                \
00132       STP_FATAL("malloc", MSG, -6);             \
00133     }                                           \
00134   }
00135 
00136 #define STP_FREE(PTR, MSG)              \
00137   {                                     \
00138     if (! PTR) {                        \
00139       STP_FATAL("free", MSG, -66);      \
00140     }                                   \
00141     free (PTR);                         \
00142     PTR = NULL;                         \
00143   }
00144 
00145 #define STP_STRDUP(PTR, SRC, MSG)       \
00146   {                                     \
00147     PTR = strdup (SRC);                 \
00148     if (! PTR) {                        \
00149       STP_FATAL("strdup", MSG, -7);     \
00150     }                                   \
00151   }
00152 
00153 #define STP_NEW_IN_LIST(WHAT, TYPE, LIST, MSG)  \
00154   {                                             \
00155     STP_MALLOC(WHAT, TYPE, MSG);                \
00156     WHAT->next = LIST;                          \
00157     LIST = WHAT;                                \
00158   }
00159 
00160 typedef enum {
00161   RSTP_PORT_EN_T,
00162   RSTP_PORT_DIS_T,
00163   RSTP_PORT_SPEED_T,
00164   RSTP_PORT_DPLEX_T,
00165   RSTP_PORT_RX_T,
00166   RSTP_PORT_TIME_T,
00167   RSTP_PORT_MNGR_T,
00168   RSTP_EVENT_LAST_DUMMY
00169 
00170 } RSTP_EVENT_T;

00172 /* for debug trace messages */
00173 
00174 #ifdef __LINUX__
00175 #ifdef USELUA
00176 extern double SimTimeReal;
00177 typedef unsigned int tim_typ; 
00178 extern tim_typ SimTime;
00179 #define stp_trace(F, B...) printf("STP ITRACE %d (%.3f):" F "\n", SimTime, SimTimeReal, ##B) 
00180 #define stp_warn(F, B...) printf("STP IWARN %d (%.3f):" F "\n", SimTime, SimTimeReal, ##B) 
00181 #define stp_error(F, B...) printf("STP IERROR %d (%.3f):" F "\n", SimTime, SimTimeReal, ##B) \
00182                            exit(0);
00183 #else
00184 extern char* sprint_time_stump (void);
00185 #define stp_trace(F, B...) printf("%s:" F "\n", sprint_time_stump(), ##B)
00186 #define stp_error(F, B...) printf("%s:" F "\n", sprint_time_stump(), ##B)
00187 #endif
00188 #else
00189 extern ULONG stp_trace (const char* fmt, ...);
00190 #endif
